help_texts.youtube_url: Copy directly from the address bar or use the 'Share' button.
help_texts.custom_prompt: You can ask a specific question, require a more detailed summary, create a plan, specify the format etc.
help_texts.model: NVIDIA NIM models provide powerful language capabilities for various tasks. Select from available models based on your needs.
help_texts.temperature: Lower temperature values (closer to 0) make responses more focused and deterministic. Higher values (closer to 2) make responses more creative and varied.
help_texts.top_p: Top P controls response diversity. Lower values (closer to 0) make responses more focused on highly probable tokens. Higher values (closer to 1) allow for more diverse responses.
help_texts.saving_responses: Whether to save responses in the directory where you run the app. The responses will be saved under '<YT-channel-name>/<video-title>.md'.
help_texts.chunk_size: Larger chunk sizes (512-1024) provide more context but may include irrelevant information. Smaller chunk sizes (128-256) are more focused but might miss context. The app compensates by retrieving more chunks for smaller sizes.
help_texts.selected_video: Once you process a video, it gets saved in a database. You can chat with it at any time, without processing it again! Tip: you may also search for videos by typing (parts of) its title.
help_texts.embeddings: Embeddings are numerical representations of text used to measure relatedness between pieces of text. Currently using OpenAI embeddings for optimal performance.
